flavorText:
"Hang on. I'm just tidying up."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreignData.flavorText: „Wartet kurz. Ich räume hier noch schnell auf." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Übergreifende Flammen
foreignData.text: Die Übergreifenden Flammen fügen 6 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen deiner Wahl du bestimmst.

foreignData.name: Pasto de las llamas
foreignData.text: Pasto de las llamas hace 6 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre cualquier cantidad de criaturas objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Attendez une seconde. Je nettoie un peu. » —Chandra Nalaàr
foreignData.name: Flammes envahissantes
foreignData.text: Les Flammes envahissantes infligent 6 blessures réparties comme vous le désirez entre n'importe quel nombre de créatures ciblées.

foreignData.flavorText: "Dammi un attimo, sto solo mettendo un po' in ordine." —Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Fiamme Dilaganti
foreignData.text: Le Fiamme Dilaganti infliggono 6 danni divisi a tua scelta tra un qualsiasi numero di creature bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「待ってて。掃除しちゃうから。」 ――チャンドラ・ナラー
foreignData.name: 炎の散布
foreignData.text: 望む数のクリーチャーを対象とする。炎の散布はそれらに６点のダメージをあなたの望むように分割して与える。

foreignData.name: 퍼져나가는 불꽃
foreignData.text: 생물을 원하는 수만큼 목표로 정한다. 퍼져나가는 불꽃은 그 목표들에게 피해 6점을 당신이 분배한 대로 나누어 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Só um minuto. Preciso arrumar algumas coisas." — Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Chamas Esparsas
foreignData.text: Chamas Esparsas causa 6 pontos de dano distribuídos à sua escolha entre qualquer número de criaturas alvo.

foreignData.name: Разгоревшееся Пламя
foreignData.text: Разгоревшееся Пламя наносит 6 повреждений, разделенных по вашему выбору между любым количеством целевых существ.

foreignData.name: 挥洒烈焰
foreignData.text: 挥洒烈焰对任意数量的目标生物造成共6点伤害，你可以任意分配。

foreignData.name: 揮灑烈焰
foreignData.text: 揮灑烈焰對任意數量的目標生物造成共6點傷害，你可以任意分配。

name: Spreading Flames
originalText: Spreading Flames deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

rulings.text: You announce how the damage will be divided as part of casting Spreading Flames. Each chosen target must receive at least 1 damage.

If Spreading Flames has multiple targets, and some, but not all, are illegal targets when Spreading Flames tries to resolve, Spreading Flames will still deal damage to the remaining legal targets according to the original damage division. If all the targets are illegal, the spell won’t resolve.

text: Spreading Flames deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
